articles.author: Simon Patterson
articles.title: 10 moments that decided the incredible 2023 MotoGP title fight - The Race
articles.description: Pecco Bagnaia looked like 2023 MotoGP world champion on the first weekend of the season. But an incredible series of twists ensued over the next eight months before he actually beat Jorge Martin to the crown
articles.content:
Pecco Bagnaia is the 2023 MotoGP world champion.
That is the outcome most would have predicted on the opening weekend of the season in Portugal eight months ago, as Bagnaia dominated while many key … [+7766 chars]
